entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:10 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 06:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -42.1°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 41 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches developing early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 41 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 55 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
